name: DCH Blood Spot Outcome GA1 SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the outcome of the blood spot screening glutaric aciduria type 1.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Newborn blood spot specimen received
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening declined
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening declined, no history of being screened
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening declined, screened in UK (as reported by parents) with no evidence of result
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening declined, screened outside UK with evidence of result
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening declined, screened outside UK with no evidence of result (situation)
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, repeat screening with further sample required
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, too young for reliable screening
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, sample taken too soon after blood transfusion (less than 72 hours)
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, insufficient sample
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): incorrect blood application
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): compressed/damaged
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: day 0 and day 5 on same card
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: NNS number missing/not accurately recorded
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: date of sample missing/not accurately recorded
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: date of birth not accurately matched
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: expired card used
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: more than 14 days in transit, too old for analysis
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, unsuitable sample: damaged in transit
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not suspected
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected glutaric aciduria type 1
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not screened for or screening incomplete
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not screened for or screening incomplete: over 1 year old, too old for screening (finding)
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not screened for or screening incomplete, moved out of area
lutaric aciduria type 1 not screened for or screening incomplete, not contactable, reasonable efforts made (finding)
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not screened for or screening incomplete, baby died
Glutaric aciduria type 1 not screened for or screening incomplete, not required, previous valid result
